mapper.select: select p.prodid , p.prodname , p.prodcateid , c.prodcatename , p.prodimage , p.prodprice , p.prodstock , to_char(p.prodinputdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodinputdate , to_char(p.prodstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodstartdate , to_char(p.prodenddate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodenddate , p.prodcontent from products p , prodcategory c where p.prodcateid = c.prodcateid and prodid = #{prodid}
